name: Grand Hotel Waldhaus

reviews.text: We have stayed here twice now. It is a large but excellent hotel with a wide choice of rooms to suit your budget and needs. The food is good and the staff helpful. You do need a bus to get to the slopes but the hotel has their own that runs regularly. The best thing about it is for the non-skiers. This hotel has indoor tennis courts and a fabulous spa area.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel

aka: Waldhaus Flims, Mountain Resort And Spa
description: In the biggest hotel park in Switzerland, a unique variety of offering await you – for summer and ski vacations with family and friends or simply for a quiet weekend for two. Our guest houses the Grand Hotel Waldhaus (member of «The Leading Hotels of the World»), Chalet Belmont and Villa Silvana offer approximately 150 rooms & suites in various design styles.
